data.text: @meganranney @ShamanJeffrey It’s worth remembering that Omicron appeared to be milder than Delta, but was actually worse or as bad as original Covid, and that bc of transmissibility, resulted in a massive amount of illness and death regardless.
@meganranney @ShamanJeffrey The answer is don’t do anything  we did previously.

@meganranney @ShamanJeffrey What continues to flummox me is that in I don’t hear anything anywhere about preparing our healthcare infrastructure for future surges. The surges so far are already driving people out of healthcare, which is just going to make the problem worse.
